question: What is the name of the chairman of the "High Powered Committee on Tobacco Control" which recommended the classification of nicotine as "Class A poison" in the newly amended Karnataka Poisons (Possession and Sale) Rules, 2019 in August 2019?
explanation: Vandita Sharma is the name of the chairman of the "High Powered Committee on Tobacco Control" which recommended the classification of nicotine as "Class A poison" in the newly amended Karnataka Poisons (Possession and Sale) Rules, 2019 in August 2019.
